# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations. This product has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards, offering unparalleled benefits that can potentially revolutionize your workflow. Given its exceptional quality and versatility, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $15000. This investment could prove to be a game-changer for your endeavors. I look forward to the opportunity to discuss how this product can contribute to your success. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
